response.overview: Foo Fighters play a two and a half hour set at the iTunes Festival, at The Roundhouse in London, on July 11, 2012.  Dave Grohl and co were joined onstage by Lemmy of Motorhead for a rendition of ‘Shake Your Blood’ and later joined by Brian May and Roger Taylor of Queen for a version of ‘Tie Your Mother Down’, with Foo's drummer Taylor Hawkins on vocals. The show received notoriety after Dave Grohl had a fan thrown out of the venue for starting a fight during 'Skin and Bones'.  Full tracklist: 1. Bridge Burning 2. Rope 3. The Pretender 4. My Hero 5. Learn to Fly 6. White Limo 7. Arlandria 8. Breakout 9. Cold Day in the Sun 10. Long Road to Ruin 11. Stacked Actors 12. Walk 13. Dear Rosemary 14. Monkey Wrench 15. Let It Die 16. These Days 17. Generator 18. Shake Your Blood 19. Best of You 20. Skin and Bones 21. All My Life Encore: 22. Wheels 23. Times Like These 24. Young Man Blues 25. Miss The Misery 26. Tie Your Mother Down 27. Everlong
response.title: Foo Fighters - iTunes Festival
